languages.text: "Немногое, Лорд-капитан. Согласно плану, разработанному господином Скаландром, после высадки отряда Вашей Светлости на станцию был объявлен режим вокс-молчания. Мы ожидали долго, но корабль презренного еретика Войгтвира так и не появился. Когда мы взяли смелость отправить на станцию гонца с донесением, он нашел лишь трупы неизвестных офицеров и другие кровавые следы".

traits.locale_text: "Немногое, Лорд-капитан. Согласно плану, разработанному господином Скаландром, после высадки отряда Вашей Светлости на станцию был объявлен режим вокс-молчания. Мы ожидали долго, но корабль презренного еретика Войгтвира так и не появился. Когда мы взяли смелость отправить на станцию гонца с донесением, он нашел лишь трупы неизвестных офицеров и другие кровавые следы".
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Not much, Lord Captain. In keeping with Master Scalander's plan, after Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's party landed on the station, we went into vox-silence. We waited for quite some time, but the despised heretic Voigtvir's ship never showed. When we took the liberty of sending a messenger to the station with a report, he found only the bodies of unknown officers and other signs of bloodshed."
languages.original_text: "Немногое, Лорд-капитан. Согласно плану, разработанному господином Скаландром, после высадки отряда Вашей Светлости на станцию был объявлен режим вокс-молчания. Мы ожидали долго, но корабль презренного еретика Войгтвира так и не появился. Когда мы взяли смелость отправить на станцию гонца с донесением, он нашел лишь трупы неизвестных офицеров и другие кровавые следы".

traits.locale_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. In accordance with Lord Scalander's plan, after Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's party landed on the station, we went into vox-silence. We waited a long time, but the ignoble heretic Voigtvir's ship never showed up. When we took the liberty of sending a messenger to the station with a report, all he found was bodies of unknown officers and other marks of bloodshed."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. In accordance with Lord Scalander's plan, after Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's party landed on the station, we went into vox-silence. We waited a long time, but the ignoble heretic Voigtvir's ship never showed up. When we took the liberty of sending a messenger to the station with a report, all he found was bodies of unknown officers and other marks of bloodshed."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

We waited for quite some time, but the despised heretic Voigtvir's ship never showed. When we took the liberty of sending a messenger to the station with a report, he found only the bodies of unknown officers and other signs of bloodshed."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. In keeping with Lord Scalander's plan, after Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's party landed on the station, we went into vox-silence. We waited for quite some time, but the despised heretic Voigtvir's ship never showed. When we took the liberty of sending a messenger to the station with a report, he found only the bodies of unknown officers and other signs of bloodshed."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. In keeping with Master Scalander's plan, after Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's party landed on the station, we went into vox-silence. We waited for quite some time, but the despised heretic Voigtvir's ship never showed. When we took the liberty of sending a messenger to the station with a report, he found only the bodies of unknown officers and other signs of bloodshed."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. In keeping with Master Scalander's plan, after Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's party landed on the station, we went into vox-silence. We waited for quite some time, but the despised heretic Voigtvir's ship never showed. When we took the liberty of sending a messenger to the station with a report, he found only the bodies of unknown officers and other signs of bloodshed."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «No mucho, Lord Capitán. De acuerdo con el plan del señor Scalander, después de que el equipo de mi{mf|lord|lady} abordase la estación, mantuvimos silencio de vocos. Aguardamos durante un largo rato, pero la nave del despreciable hereje Voigtvir no apareció. Cuando nos tomamos la libertad de enviar un mensajero a la estación con un informe, lo único que encontró fueron los cadáveres de unos oficiales desconocidos y otros indicios de violencia».
languages.original_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. In keeping with Master Scalander's plan, after Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's party landed on the station, we went into vox-silence. We waited for quite some time, but the despised heretic Voigtvir's ship never showed. When we took the liberty of sending a messenger to the station with a report, he found only the bodies of unknown officers and other signs of bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: «No mucho, Lord Capitán. De acuerdo con el plan de lord Scalander, después de que el equipo de mi{mf|lord|lady} abordase la estación, mantuvimos silencio de vocos. Aguardamos durante un largo rato, pero la nave del despreciable hereje Voigtvir no apareció. Cuando nos tomamos la libertad de enviar un mensajero a la estación con un informe, lo único que encontró fueron los cadáveres de unos oficiales desconocidos y otros indicios de violencia».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “我们并不太清楚，舰长大人。按照斯卡兰德大师的计划，您的队伍抵达空间站后，我们就关闭了音阵系统。我们等了很长时间，但维特威尔那个异端分子的飞船始终没有出现。于是，我们冒昧地派了一位信使去空间站询问情况，但他只发现了很多不知名军官的尸体，以及其他暴力冲突迹象。”
languages.original_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. In keeping with Master Scalander's plan, after Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's party landed on the station, we went into vox-silence. We waited for quite some time, but the despised heretic Voigtvir's ship never showed. When we took the liberty of sending a messenger to the station with a report, he found only the bodies of unknown officers and other signs of bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: “我们并不太清楚，舰长大人。按照斯卡兰德大人的计划，您的队伍抵达空间站后，我们就关闭了音阵系统。我们等了很长时间，但那维特威尔那个异端分子的飞船始终没有出现。于是，我们冒昧地派了一位信使去空间站询问情况，但他只发现了很多不知名军官的尸体，以及其他暴力冲突迹象。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « Pas grand-chose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Conformément au plan de maître Scalander, nous avons cessé toute communication-vox après l'arrivée de votre groupe à la station. Nous avons attendu un certain temps, mais le vaisseau de l'hérétique Voigtvir n'est pas venu. Quand nous avons pris la liberté d'envoyer un messager faire son rapport à la station, il n'a trouvé que les cadavres d'officiers inconnus entre autres signes de carnage. »
languages.original_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. In keeping with Master Scalander's plan, after Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's party landed on the station, we went into vox-silence. We waited for quite some time, but the despised heretic Voigtvir's ship never showed. When we took the liberty of sending a messenger to the station with a report, he found only the bodies of unknown officers and other signs of bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: « Pas grand-chose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Conformément au plan du seigneur Scalander, nous avons cessé toute communication-vox après l'arrivée de votre groupe à la station. Nous avons attendu un certain temps, mais le vaisseau de l'hérétique Voigtvir n'est pas venu. Quand nous avons pris la liberté d'envoyer un messager faire son rapport à la station, il n'a trouvé que les cadavres d'officiers inconnus entre autres signes de carnage. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「あまり多くは存じておりません、ロード・キャプテン。マスター・スカランダーの計画に則り、あなたの一行がステーションに着艦した後、我々はヴォクス・サイレンスに入りました。しばらく待っていましたが、異端者ボイトヴィルの船は現れませんでした。こちらの判断でステーションに使者を送って報告させたところ、見知らぬ士官の死体と流血の痕跡が見つかっただけだったのです」
languages.original_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. In keeping with Master Scalander's plan, after Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's party landed on the station, we went into vox-silence. We waited for quite some time, but the despised heretic Voigtvir's ship never showed. When we took the liberty of sending a messenger to the station with a report, he found only the bodies of unknown officers and other signs of bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: 「あまり多くは存じておりません、ロード・キャプテン。マスター・スカランダーの計画に則り、あなたの一行がステーションに着艦した後、我々はヴォクス・サイレンスに入りました。しばらく待っていましたが、異端者ボイトヴィルの船は現れませんでした。こちらの判断でステーションに使者を送って報告させたところ、見知らぬ士官の死体と流血の痕跡が見つかっただけだったのです」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Nicht viel, Lord Captain. Wie von Meister Scalander geplant haben wir Vox-Stille gewahrt, nachdem der Trupp Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} auf der Station gelandet war. Wir haben lange gewartet, doch das Schiff des verhassten Ketzers Voigtvir ist nie aufgetaucht. Als wir so frei waren, einen Boten mit einem Bericht auf die Station zu schicken, hat er nur die Leichen unbekannter Offiziere und andere Anzeichen von Blutvergießen vorgefunden."
languages.original_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. In keeping with Master Scalander's plan, after Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's party landed on the station, we went into vox-silence. We waited for quite some time, but the despised heretic Voigtvir's ship never showed. When we took the liberty of sending a messenger to the station with a report, he found only the bodies of unknown officers and other signs of bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht viel, Lord Captain. Wie von Lord Scalander geplant haben wir Vox-Stille gewahrt, nachdem der Trupp Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} auf der Station gelandet war. Wir haben lange gewartet, doch das Schiff des verhassten Ketzers Voigtvir ist nie aufgetaucht. Als wir so frei waren, einen Boten mit einem Bericht auf die Station zu schicken, hat er nur die Leichen unbekannter Offiziere und andere Anzeichen von Blutvergießen vorgefunden."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Fazla bir şey bilmiyorum Lord Kaptan. Üstat Scalander'in planına uygun şekilde {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin gemisi istasyona indiğinde voks sessizliğine büründük. Uzun bir süre bekledik ama aşağılık kâfir Voigtvir'in gemisi gelmedi. İstasyona durumu bildirecek bir elçi göndermeye karar verdik, o da bilinmeyen subayların bedenlerini ve katliamın izlerini buldu."
languages.original_text: "Not much, Lord Captain. In keeping with Master Scalander's plan, after Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's party landed on the station, we went into vox-silence. We waited for quite some time, but the despised heretic Voigtvir's ship never showed. When we took the liberty of sending a messenger to the station with a report, he found only the bodies of unknown officers and other signs of bloodshed."

traits.locale_text: "Fazla bir şey bilmiyorum Lord Kaptan. Üstat Scalander'in planına uygun şekilde {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerinin gemisi istasyona indiğinde voks sessizliğine büründük. Uzun bir süre bekledik ama aşağılık kâfir Voigtvir'in gemisi gelmedi. İstasyona bir raporla birlikte elçi göndermeye karar verdiğimizde sadece bilinmeyen subayların bedenlerini ve katliamın izlerini buldu."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster
